com.sun.enterprise.mgmt.transport
Interface ShoalMessageSender

All Known Subinterfaces:
MessageSender, MulticastMessageSender, NetworkManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMessageSender, AbstractMulticastMessageSender, AbstractMultiMessageSender, AbstractNetworkManager, BlockingIOMulticastSender, GrizzlyNetworkManager, GrizzlyTCPConnectorWrapper, GrizzlyUDPConnectorWrapper, JxtaNetworkManager, JxtaPipeManagerWrapper, VirtualMulticastSender
public interface ShoalMessageSender

This is the top interface of the message sender Currently, TCP and UDP(includes Multicast) transport layers are supported.

Author:
Bongjae Chang
